title: csrc/api folder not found
body_html:
Issue description

I tried to build pytorch on both Windows 8.1 and Windows 10, but when I tried to use csrc api(e.g #include <torch/crsc/api/nn/modules/linear.h>) I found out that csrc/api folder does not exist where pytorch is installed, even though it exists where I cloned the source code. I assume I didn't build pytorch correctly.

In order to install pytorch, I followed the steps described here: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch and the last commit was fa5d95a when I cloned pytorch.
I set the following env variables: NO_CUDA=1 and FULL_CAFFE2=1 and I built it using an anaconda environment.

At first, I tried to run an example which computes the sum of two tensors, but I received these errors:

Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State
Error LNK2001 unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) public: struct at::Type & __thiscall at::TensorImpl::type(void)const " (_imp?type@TensorImpl@at@@QBEAAUType@2@XZ) Project1 C:\Users\user1\source\repos\Project1\Project1\Source.obj 1

Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State
Error LNK2001 unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) class std::basic_ostream<char,struct std::char_traits > & __cdecl at::print(class std::basic_ostream<char,struct std::char_traits > &,struct at::Tensor const &,__int64)" (_imp?print@at@@YAAAV?$basic_ostream@DU?$char_traits@D@std@@@std@@AAV23@ABUTensor@1@_J@Z) Project1 C:\Users\user1\source\repos\Project1\Project1\Source.obj 1

Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State
Error LNK2001 unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) private: static struct at::UndefinedTensor at::UndefinedTensor::_singleton" (_imp?_singleton@UndefinedTensor@at@@0U12@A) Project1 C:\Users\user1\source\repos\Project1\Project1\Source.obj 1

Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State
Error LNK2001 unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) struct at::Tensor __cdecl at::native::tensor(class at::ArrayRef,struct at::TensorOptions const &)" (_imp?tensor@native@at@@ya?AUTensor@2@V?$ArrayRef@H@2@ABUTensorOptions@2@@z) Project1 C:\Users\user1\source\repos\Project1\Project1\Source.obj 1

Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State
Error LNK2001 unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) public: struct at::TensorOptions & __thiscall at::TensorOptions::dtype(enum at::ScalarType)" (_imp?dtype@TensorOptions@at@@QAEAAU12@W4ScalarType@2@@z) Project1 C:\Users\user1\source\repos\Project1\Project1\Source.obj 1

Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State
Error LNK2001 unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) public: __thiscall at::TensorOptions::TensorOptions(void)" (_imp??0TensorOptions@at@@QAE@XZ) Project1 C:\Users\user1\source\repos\Project1\Project1\Source.obj 1

Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State
Error LNK2001 unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) public: static struct at::UndefinedTensor * __cdecl at::UndefinedTensor::singleton(void)" (_imp?singleton@UndefinedTensor@at@@SAPAU12@XZ) Project1 C:\Users\user1\source\repos\Project1\Project1\Source.obj 1

Code example

#include <torch/torch.h>

int main() {

auto a = at::tensor({ 1, 2 });
auto b = at::tensor({ 2, 3 });
auto c = a * b;
std::cout << c << std::endl;

return 0;

}

System Info

  • PyTorch or Caffe2:PyTorch
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source):source
  • Build command you used (if compiling from source):python setup.py install
  • OS:Windows 10 x64 and Windows 8.1 Pro x64
  • PyTorch version: master(last commit was fa5d95a)
  • Python version:3.7.0
  • CUDA/cuDNN version:None(CPU build)
  • GPU models and configuration:None
  • GCC version (if compiling from source):MSVC 14.11.25503
  • CMake version:3.12.0
  • Anaconda version: 4.5.10

body:
## Issue description

I tried to build pytorch on both Windows 8.1 and Windows 10, but when I tried to use csrc api(e.g #include <torch/crsc/api/nn/modules/linear.h>) I found out that csrc/api folder does not exist where pytorch is installed, even though it exists where I cloned the source code. I assume I didn't build pytorch correctly.

In order to install pytorch, I followed the steps described here: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch and the last commit was fa5d95a00c4212381cd9ef4ee26cabad294ee8e0 when I cloned pytorch.
I set the following env variables: NO_CUDA=1 and FULL_CAFFE2=1 and I built it using an anaconda environment.

At first, I tried to run an example which computes the sum of two tensors, but I received these errors:

Severity	Code	Description	Project	File	Line	Suppression State
Error	LNK2001	unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) public: struct at::Type & __thiscall at::TensorImpl::type(void)const " (__imp_?type@TensorImpl@at@@QBEAAUType@2@XZ)	Project1	C:\Users\user1\source\repos\Project1\Project1\Source.obj	1	

Severity	Code	Description	Project	File	Line	Suppression State
Error	LNK2001	unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) class std::basic_ostream<char,struct std::char_traits<char> > & __cdecl at::print(class std::basic_ostream<char,struct std::char_traits<char> > &,struct at::Tensor const &,__int64)" (__imp_?print@at@@YAAAV?$basic_ostream@DU?$char_traits@D@std@@@std@@AAV23@ABUTensor@1@_J@Z)	Project1	C:\Users\user1\source\repos\Project1\Project1\Source.obj	1	

Severity	Code	Description	Project	File	Line	Suppression State
Error	LNK2001	unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) private: static struct at::UndefinedTensor at::UndefinedTensor::_singleton" (__imp_?_singleton@UndefinedTensor@at@@0U12@A)	Project1	C:\Users\user1\source\repos\Project1\Project1\Source.obj	1	

Severity	Code	Description	Project	File	Line	Suppression State
Error	LNK2001	unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) struct at::Tensor __cdecl at::native::tensor(class at::ArrayRef<int>,struct at::TensorOptions const &)" (__imp_?tensor@native@at@@YA?AUTensor@2@V?$ArrayRef@H@2@ABUTensorOptions@2@@Z)	Project1	C:\Users\user1\source\repos\Project1\Project1\Source.obj	1	

Severity	Code	Description	Project	File	Line	Suppression State
Error	LNK2001	unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) public: struct at::TensorOptions & __thiscall at::TensorOptions::dtype(enum at::ScalarType)" (__imp_?dtype@TensorOptions@at@@QAEAAU12@W4ScalarType@2@@Z)	Project1	C:\Users\user1\source\repos\Project1\Project1\Source.obj	1	

Severity	Code	Description	Project	File	Line	Suppression State
Error	LNK2001	unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) public: __thiscall at::TensorOptions::TensorOptions(void)" (__imp_??0TensorOptions@at@@QAE@XZ)	Project1	C:\Users\user1\source\repos\Project1\Project1\Source.obj	1	

Severity	Code	Description	Project	File	Line	Suppression State
Error	LNK2001	unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) public: static struct at::UndefinedTensor * __cdecl at::UndefinedTensor::singleton(void)" (__imp_?singleton@UndefinedTensor@at@@SAPAU12@XZ)	Project1	C:\Users\user1\source\repos\Project1\Project1\Source.obj	1	

## Code example

#include <torch/torch.h>

int main() {

	auto a = at::tensor({ 1, 2 });
	auto b = at::tensor({ 2, 3 });
	auto c = a * b;
	std::cout << c << std::endl;

	return 0;
}

## System Info
- PyTorch or Caffe2:PyTorch
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source):source
- Build command you used (if compiling from source):python setup.py install
- OS:Windows 10 x64 and Windows 8.1 Pro x64
- PyTorch version: master(last commit was fa5d95a00c4212381cd9ef4ee26cabad294ee8e0)
- Python version:3.7.0
- CUDA/cuDNN version:None(CPU build)
- GPU models and configuration:None
- GCC version (if compiling from source):MSVC 14.11.25503
- CMake version:3.12.0
- Anaconda version: 4.5.10
